column2: an A.M. Eatery////The Pineapple Upside Down Pancake was sweet perfection.  Again
column3: each individual ingredient was delicious by itself
column4: and the combo was superb.  Their pancakes are the cake-y style that I love
column5: not sponge-y at all.  The pineapple chunks were small size and generous throughout the pancake.  The crème anglaise was delicious perfection
column6: and the cinnamon butter to spread was also perfection.  This pancake is the type of item that I would think about later and return to the restaurant to order it again.
